History

This is a first board from 1778r.

Thomas Blake and his first board made from palm wood in 1908r.

In 1923r. Thomas Blake open first Aruba boards store.

Woody Brown - first winner with Aruba board on Austrian Surfing Competition.

If you fall down ten times, stand up eleven.
- Thomas Blake
